plot: The best of the 80's from E.T. to Falco, from Nena to Samantha Fox and the early years of German stars like Thomas Gottschalk and Günther Jauch.
plot_en: The best of the 80's from E.T. to Falco, from Nena to Samantha Fox and the early years of German stars like Thomas Gottschalk and Günther Jauch.
plot_es: The best of the 80's from E.T. to Falco, from Nena to Samantha Fox and the early years of German stars like Thomas Gottschalk and Günther Jauch.
title: Die 80er Jahre Show
